SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.Name, CC.Name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.StoreID , AA.ChannelID , AA.BrandID , AA.ProductID , AA.OrderDate , AA.OrderTime , AA.OrderQty , AA.OrderAmt
, CC.Name as ChannelName , BB.Name as BrandName , PP.Name as ProductName
FROM dbo.TOrderSumTime AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TProduct PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ProductID = PP.ID WHERE AA.OrderDate >= #StartDate# AND AA.OrderDate <= #EndDate#
AND AA.StoreID = #StoreID#
AND AA.ChannelID = #ChannelID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
AND AA.ProductID = #ProductID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.* , BB.Name as BrandName , CC.Name as ChannelName , PP.Name as ProductName FROM dbo.TOrderSumTime AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TChannel CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TProduct PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ProductID = PP.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

INSERT INTO dbo.TOrderSumTime ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, StoreID, ChannelID, BrandID, ProductID, OrderDate, OrderTime, OrderQty, OrderAmt ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #StoreID#, #ChannelID#, #BrandID#, #ProductID#, #OrderDate#, #OrderTime#, #OrderQty#, #OrderAmt# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TOrderSum SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, StoreID = #StoreID# , ChannelID = #ChannelID# , BrandID = #BrandID# , ProductID = #ProductID# , OrderDate = #OrderDate# , OrderTime = #OrderTime# , OrderQty = #OrderQty# , OrderAmt = #OrderAmt# WHERE ID = #ID#
